scene.name: Chinese checkers setup
scene.description: A star-shaped Chinese Checkers board with peg-style or marble-style pieces

task.name: Move a checker piece
task.description: Pick up a checker piece and move it to a target hole on the board
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice playing Chinese Checkers. The goal is to move a piece to another hole.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习下跳棋。目标是将一枚棋子移动到另一个孔位中。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start moving the checker piece.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始移动跳棋棋子。

steps.description: Start playing Chinese Checkers by picking up a piece and placing it in a new hole
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start playing Chinese Checkers.

constraints.notes: Ensure the piece is fully inserted into the hole; focus on the vertical lift and drop motion.
